definition: to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
variant of 角[jue2]/role

sentences.english: I have got on this light-speed train to explore my destination.
sentences.chinese: 我已踏上这辆超光速列车，去探索我的落脚点。

sentences.english: Chapter four is the end-result and focal point of this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是本文的落脚点，也是重点。

sentences.english: I find the whole slant of this article pejorative and misleading.
sentences.chinese: 我发现，文章的落脚点是偏激的且具有误导性的。

sentences.english: Butterfly disappearance of the day, if there is a settled, I would like to hide.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶消失的那天，如果有一个落脚处，我想隐藏起来。

sentences.english: The owner of "New Store" Stationery Store came to Hengshan Township from other county.
sentences.chinese: 新店文具印刷行的老板是从外地到横山乡落脚。

sentences.english: At what unknown Keya-forest-wharf will they anchor?
sentences.chinese: 会到哪个无名的柯亚森林码头落脚？

sentences.english: When a story is Done, it needs a home.
sentences.chinese: 当一个故事“完成”后，它需要有一个落脚之处。
他落脚在一家大旅馆内。

sentences.english: Automatic Block and Footing keys for material estimates .
sentences.chinese: 自动闭塞和落脚点钥匙材料估计。

sentences.english: Student is the starting point and end-result of campus culture construction of independent colleges.
sentences.chinese: 独立学院校园文化建设的出发点和落脚点是学生。

sentences.english: Among those nations you will find no repose, no resting place for the sole of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 在那些国中，你必不得安逸，也不得落脚之地。

sentences.english: The stone village have become all footing.
sentences.chinese: 石头村成了众人落脚的地方。

sentences.english: Both return to the boat because they can't find a place to land.
sentences.chinese: 它们都飞回了穿上，因为它们找不到落脚之处。

sentences.english: Flamingos use this particular wetland as a resting place during their migration south in the winter Photograph: Evangelos Bougiotis/EPA
sentences.chinese: 它们将此独特的湿地当成一个南迁越冬的临时落脚地。

sentences.english: There are many stationery shops and publishing house business department here.
sentences.chinese: 许多文具店和出版社商业部门也在这里落脚。

sentences.english: Thus specifically in China, those evolve to the construction and perfection of credit institution .
sentences.chinese: 落脚到中国，就演变成中国的信用制度的构建与完善。

definition: to stay at/to live in (temporarily)
to make one's home/to take shelter
to stop on the way for a rest
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to settle down/to set up a home
to find a place where one can fit in/to make one's home/to seek shelter
residence/dwelling/dwelling place
hiding place/hideout
to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence
remote/desolate/far from the city
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
here/this place
to lodge/to stay (for the night)
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/undisturbed/peaceful
lonely/secluded
to lodge
